name: @fabwcie/drawer
description: Canvas drawer for free hand drawing and more utility tools.
author: Winkler Fabien <fabienwinkler@outlook.fr>

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish --access public
